title: Endgame
description: Rod Covlin calls 911 after his young daughter finds his estranged wife, Shele Danishefsky, unconscious in the bathtub. Soon after her mysterious death, Shele’s loved ones would come to suspect that what happened was no accident. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 12, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
